ImageUpload.Title: Drag & Drop file here or <bold><underlined>Choose a file</underlined></bold>

PageDescription: Follow the following steps to submit an image for an AI-powered study.

UploadAnImage.Title: Upload an image
UploadAnImage.Caption: The better quality image has, the more precise the diagnostic result might be.

ChooseDiagnostics.Title: Choose from available diagnostics
ChooseDiagnostics.Caption: Click on the card to select a diagnostic for an image.

StudyOverview.Title: Study Overview
StudyOverview.Caption: Please review the study summary. Once the study is created it won't be able to edit it.

SelectedDiagnosticsCaption: Configure any available settings for each selected item.
ModelSelectTooltip: Results of diagnostic may vary depending on which model you choose. It's recommended to choose multiple models if possible.

ValidationsMessage.ChooseDiagnostics: Please choose at least one diagnostic to proceed with the next step.
ValidationsMessage.UploadImage: Please upload an image to proceed with the next step.

CreateStudyStatusDialog.YouCanTrackTheStudyStatusOnTheReportsPag: You can track the study status on the reports page.
